document_data.name: Artichoke
document_data.mainbody: The '''artichoke''' was a type of vegetable found in the Realms.
document_data.Availability:
Places in the Realms where artichoke was known to be produced were as follows:
* In [[west Faer√ªn]]'s [[Lands of Intrigue]] region, artichokes were cultivated in abundance by the town of [[Imnescar]].
* Ground artichokes were sold via ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' for 200 [[gp]] per pound.
document_data.Notable Artichoke Products:
* Some used juiced artichokes as a curative for [[jaundice]].<ref>
* In [[Calimshan]] and the ancient [[Calim Empire]], artichoke hearts were used to stuff [[plum wine]]-picked [[peacock]] [[egg]]s.

Notable Users of Artichokes.Businesses: * The [[Old Troll's Foot]] would often serve a spicy bean soup featuring artichoke and [[asparagus]].
Notable Users of Artichokes.Individuals: * [[Suleman al Fataq]] had artichokes at his disposal, often eating them in the midmorning with [[honey]].<ref>{{Cite dragon/218/The Ecology of the Bird Maiden|78}}
